name: Remote Code Execute via Winrm.vbs
description: Detects an attempt to execute code or create service on remote host via winrm.vbs.
false_positives: Legitimate use for administartive purposes. Unlikely
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\cscript.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:cscript.exe) AND (process.command_line:*winrm* AND process.command_line:*invoke\ Create\ wmicimv2\/Win32_* AND process.command_line:*\-r\:http*))`
